com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Control

  • public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a control function in Mano's computer as detailed in:
    Computer System Architecture, 3rd edition
    By M. Morris Mano
    Published by Prentice-Hall, c 1993
    Chapter 5, pp 123-172.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String description
      The description of this Control in register transfer language.
      private java.util.function.Predicate<Computer> predicate
      The Predicate which tests a Computer for the conditions of this Control.
